meanings.definition: The standard unit of angular measure, equal to the angle subtended at the center of a circle by an arc equal in length to the radius.
meanings.sent1: In geometry class, we learned that a radian is used to measure angles in circles.
meanings.sent2: She calculated the angle in radians to determine the arc length.
meanings.sent3: The radian walked into the circle and everyone cheered for the angle hero.
meanings.sent4: Her love for math was as vast as a radian, encompassing all angles of learning.
meanings.sent5: The concept of a radian clicked in his mind like a perfectly fitting puzzle piece.
